conclusion: Analyze the flow paths from points A, B, and C to determine which container the liquid will flow into.
Liquid encounters a black baffle that directs it to the left.
Liquid continues to flow leftward and enters container D.
Liquid encounters a purple baffle that directs it to the right.
Liquid continues to flow rightward and enters container E.
Liquid encounters a cyan baffle that directs it to the right.
Liquid continues to flow rightward and enters container F.
Liquid from A flows into container D.
Liquid from B flows into container E.
Liquid from C flows into container F.
Final Answer: A flows into D, B flows into E, C flows into F.
